titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University Press Club of Michigan records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: University Press Club of Michigan records

archdesc.bioghist: Founded in 1917 at the University of Michigan, the University Press Club of Michigan worked to foster journalism standards. Membership includes representatives of small and medium-sized newspapers throughout Michigan. Since 1966 the group has sponsored the Excellence in Journalism Awards and the O'Leary award.
archdesc.scopecontent: University Press Club records include information about the organization, press releases, annual meeting material, and lists of award winners. Also includes u-matic videotapes of a mock libel trial - Wheelwright v. Sinclair and the Trumpet, and audiocassette tapes.
